listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.3-3 are included:

listitem.simpara: libarchive-zip-perl (2018-10860) (47853)
liblivemedia (2018-4013) (48202)
network-manager (2018-15688) (48164)
openssl (2018-0732 2018-0734 2018-0735 2018-0737) Need to be imported into errata4.3-2

listitem.para:
The following updated packages from Debian 9.6 are included (48278):
accerciser base-files brltty canna cargo chromium-browser confuse debian-installer debian-installer-netboot-images discount dnsmasq dom4j dpdk dropbear drupal7 easytag enigmail espeakup fastforward firetray fuse ganeti globus-gsi-credential gnupg2 gphoto2-cffi graphicsmagick grub2 hdparm https-everywhere i3-wm icecast2 iipimage jhead kamailio lastpass-cli ldap2zone libcgroup libclamunrar libdap libdatetime-timezone-perl libextractor libmail-deliverystatus-bounceparser-perl libseccomp libxml-stream-perl libxml-structured-perl lxcfs mailman mbedtls mediawiki mgetty moin mosquitto multipath-tools mupdf nagstamon network-manager-applet nginx ola openafs opensc otrs2 pkgsel publicsuffix python-django python-imaplib2 roundcube ruby-json-jwt rustc sddm serf soundconverter spice-gtk sqlcipher strongswan subversion sympa systraq thunderbird tinc tomcat-native tor trafficserver tzdata ublock-origin vagrant vmtk x11vnc xapian-core xmotd xorg-server zutils

The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
backports.ssl-match-hostname (43612) cached-property (43612) docker-compose (43612) dockerpty (43612) docopt (43612) lazy-object-proxy (48086) libconfig-inifiles-perl (48201) libhx (47933) libresample (48007) python-bsddb3 (47933) python-docker (43612) python-functools32 (43612) python-jsonschema (43612) python-ruamel.ordereddict (43612) python-typing (43612) ruamel.yaml (43612) texttable (43612) websocket-client (43612) wimlib (47994)

listitem.simpara: The UCS DVD now contains the package netcat-openbsd. It is required for VNC access to virtual machines (48015).
If UCS is installed from an USB stick, grub-install shows a screen to select the boot device. That list no longer includes the USB stick itself (47925).
&ucsUCR; modules cannot accidentally get registered multiple times anymore (35239).
Ensure that the address associated with the network interface specified via the &ucsUCRV; interfaces/primary is the first entry in /etc/hosts (30397).
Ensure that the directory /var/univention-backup/ exists in univention-config-registry-backup (47336).

The &ucsUDL; opens two connections: a persistent connection to a &ucsUDN; and an on-demand connection to an LDAP server. In some rare situations two different hosts were contacted for those connections, which could lead to inconsistencies in LDAP replication (48030).
Fix terminal detection code in univention-directory-listener-ctrl (47870).
Log a message when a listener module using the new API was deactivated (47871).
Fixed a crash when the &ucsUCRV;s server/role and ldap/master are not set (47837).
An alternative mechanism to initialize the &ucsUDL; in large environments was added (47783).
A widget for limited text input has been moved to the common library (48106).
Long item names in the tree widget no longer overlap underlying items (45323).
The version of the dojo framework has been upgraded (47997).
The scrolling in the &ucsUVMM; module has been improved (36624).
The scrolling in the LDAP directory module has been improved (45598).
It is now possible to define custom categories for the portal (47243).
An issue with the drop-down menu for the search value in the advanced search of UDM modules being unusable has been resolved (44471).
The ordering of the default categories in the Portal unintentionally changed with a previous update. This has been reverted (47872).
Fix the broken text of the portal title and name (47877).
Portal entries not shown after update to latest portal version (47870).
Portal entries were not shown after the update to erratum 250 (47864).
The visibility of a portal entry object can now be restricted to multiple groups instead of just one (46927).
It is now possible to define custom categories for the portal (47243).
Allow to customize portal with static pages (43442).
Fix SAML metadata creation for external certificate authorities like Let's Encrypt (47700).
The scrolling in the &ucsUVMM; module has been improved (36624).
The scrolling in the LDAP directory module has been improved (45598).
Fix regression in traceback handling (47857).
Improved check for database existence when installing an app which uses a database (42690).
Checkboxes in the App Settings were marked as required in the HTML causing problems when submitting the form (47824).
The App Center now supports Apps that require multiple containers to work by using docker-compose (43612).
In some cases the App Center removed installed listener modules (48104).
Never prompt in container commands during the app installation (47763).

Installation routines now ask for valid credentials before actually doing anything. Prior to this change, the user may have been prompted for credentials in the middle of the installation process. Invalid credentials at this point may have led to errors (47619).
Proxy settings in containers are updated before an app upgrade (47439).
When an app is opened in the App Center, the page now scrolls to the top and when the App detail page is closed, the previous scroll position is restored (39667).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: System accounts are not counted if the license allows unlimited users (48145).
Keep the choices for the modules in extended attributes updated (30387).
Added a new hook base class AttributeHook. This can be used to implement a mapping between LDAP and UDM for extended attributes (43129).
The username admin is now allowed (38092).
The UDM module settings/data was added. It can be used to store arbitrary data in LDAP (47944).
A new API has been added that aims to provide a much easier handles for UDM calls (47316).
The ordering of the default categories in the Portal unintentionally changed with a previous update. This has been reverted (47872).
Ensure update of syntax class mailinglist_name in running Python processes (48020).
Revert reloading syntax.py (48026).
Searching for some UDM properties led to a traceback (47910).
Some error messages are more explicit (47861).
Fix a traceback during portal assignment at computer objects when a settings/portal object is created (47818).
The search filter generated for boolean and multi-value properties of UDM objects was not correct (40672).
The visibility of a portal entry object can now be restricted to multiple groups instead of just one (46927).

For performance reasons, UDM stores the last used value of uidNumber and gidNumber in an LDAP object in the univentionLastUsedValue attribute. Usually these two values are monotonously increasing with automatic assignment. When manually specifying the uidNumber/gidNumber when creating an object, however, this value could jump back to a lower value and previously used and now free values could be reused if necessary. This behavior has now been disabled. univentionLastUsedValue is now monotonously increasing (41109).
User Templates now have access to the alphanum option (47580).
It is now possible to define custom categories for the portal (47243).
Allow to customize portal with an about page (43442).
Searching for some UDM properties led to a traceback (47910).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The error messages for the join into an Active Directory domain have been improved (42430).
A regression introduced while fixing 42022 could cause an appliance setup to fail due to missing software components (47767).
When setting up an UCS appliance to join into an existing UCS domain, the installation could fail due to a failure to reconfigure the network interfaces (47767).
Adapt &ucsUSS; to work with Firefox 60 (47808).
Only try to download the host certificate for 10 minutes when joining a new system. Otherwise, mark the join as failed (30005).
Fixed join failing when two MAC addresses are set on the computer object. Also, joining a host with multiple network interfaces now attaches them all to the computer object (47338).
The ACL check for the Samba/AD SYSVOL files has been improved to show the name of missing files and directories (47583).

A new diagnostic plugin has been added that scans through LDAP and finds objects that lack a univentionObjectType although they should have one. The plugin also allows to migrate those objects. Having a univentionObjectType allows for other services to use a convenient LDAP filter (47844).
Improved logging of diagnostic module actions and the diagnostic checks are now executed in lexical order (47649).
Log LDAP connections at log level PROCESS instead of INFO (48030).
Setting a user quota through a policy now works with journaled (usrjquota) quota as well (47764).
A widget for limited text input has been moved to the common library (48106).
The &ucsUDM; module flavors are requiring a minimal set of allowed UMC commands now to be visible in the UMC (47880).
A regression in the users/self module regarding saving unset properties with default values has been addressed (48047).
The scrolling in the &ucsUVMM; module has been improved (36624).
The scrolling in the LDAP directory module has been improved (45598).
The search filter generated for boolean and multi-value properties of UDM objects was not correct (40672).
User Templates now have access to the alphanum option (47580).
It is now possible to define custom categories for the portal (47243).
The page now scrolls to the top when opening the detail page of an UDM object (39667).

The function umc_init does not assume to find the LDAP group objects cn=Domain Admins and cn=Domain Users as direct children of the cn=groups container anymore. Instead it searches for them (or their localized equivalents, like Domänen-Admins) (38057).
Check output from slapschema during registration of new schemas for errors (45571).
The error messages for the join into an Active Directory domain have been improved (42430).
The UDM module settings/data was added. It can be used to store arbitrary data in LDAP (47944).
False warning message during App installation were removed (47931).
LDAP ACLs for the portal category module have been fixed (48091).
A spelling error in the English description for &ucsUCRV; ldap/debug/level has been fixed (48102).
Fix automatic renewal of Diffie-Hellman parameters for forward secrecy (47974).
Adjust description of &ucsUCRV; ldap/database/mdb/envflags (47869).
It is now possible to define custom categories for the portal (47243).
Allow to customize portal with static pages (43442).
In case a Debian package update fails due to unmet dependencies univention-updater now logs a more useful error message (34444).

The rule for the PostgreSQL superuser has been moved to the beginning of pg_hba.conf to always grant access to that internal user. This is required for automatic maintenance and similar tasks (31081).
The new &ucsUCRV; postgres9/pg_hba/config/* allows for additional configuration options in the file pg_hba.conf (47276).
ifconfig was missing in the UCS container. Also fixed parsing of the tool's output (46665).
The &ucsUDM; module flavors are requiring a minimal set of allowed UMC commands now to be visible in the UMC (47880).
Enable stunnel to run on systems without univention-saml installed, like &ucsMember; and &ucsSlave; servers. The univention-saml package was updated to create the required directories (47250).
The join script now always updates the local database password (45531).

Remove ClamAV from AMaViS configuration if clamav-daemon is disabled via &ucsUCRV; clamav/daemon/autostart=no. Without this change Postfix is unable to process incoming mails due to a non-working AMaViS (39372).

When creating users, an SSL error occurred when uploading the initial Sieve script if the Dovecot server used an external SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt, for example. The new &ucsUCRV; mail/dovecot/sieve/client/server can now be used to specify an external FQDN for the Sieve script upload that matches the external SSL certificate (41018).
Fix a traceback when querying for printer users (44434).
The printer restrictions are reloaded after changes are made (43227).
The Nagios RAID check now uses the plugin mdstat (47319).

From now on univention-radius adds a section realm in proxy.conf to allow RADIUS authentication with DOMAIN\USERNAME. The original proxy.conf is diverted to proxy.conf.debian and is included into the new proxy.conf (42535).
A user's description attribute is now no longer modified if the module ldap has been activated manually (48105).
Squid is now compiled with support for OpenSSL again. This feature was lost during the update to UCS 4.3-0 because Squid 3.5 requires an additional compile time option for this (47809).
The cron job to revoke expired certificates now works properly again (47896).
SSL host certificates are now also valid for DNS alias records (44469).

The command univention-certificate renew does not revoke the old certificates anymore, so that they are still valid until they expire. Additionally, certificates can now get addressed by their serial numbers using the option -id (41013).
Show a warning if the entered VNC password for a virtual machine exceeds a certain length (48106).
Report IO errors in UMC frontend (22695).
Drop corrupt cache files on errors (35761).
Fix assignment of target device name for newly added disks (47956).

Migration of virtual machines between incompatible CPUs can be prevented by setting the new &ucsUCRV; uvmm/vm/cpu/host-model to either missing or always: This modifies the XML description to include a description for the CPU of the host system for running virtual machines. If a CPU description is present, UVMM will check the target host for compatibility. The migration is aborted if the target host's CPU is not compatible. Virtual machines must be restarted to activate pending changes. UVMM monitors running virtual machines for reboot events and restarts them automatically (21386).
Always set map acl inherit = yes for samba shares if NT ACLs and inherit ACLs are activated (47850).
Ignore netlogon_creds_cli.tdb in univention-samba4-backup (46468).
Changing the primary group of a user triggered an inconsistency in the DN SID component of the member attribute. In special situations samba-tool dbcheck was unable to fix this automatically (48054).
Continue samba-tool dbcheck --fix even if a modification failed (48040).

When joining a new Samba/AD DC, Samba replicates all LDAP partitions independently. Depending on timing the replication of the linked attribute serverReference could fail, if CN=Configuration gets replicated before the main domain partition. As a result DRS replication could fail (47441).
When performing an AD-Takeover out of an ad/member setup, the S4-Connector reported tracebacks due to missing NT password hashes in OpenLDAP (35540).
Fix sync_to_ucs reject for DNS Start of Authority (SOA) records with trailing dot missing in the Name Server (NS) resource record (44104).
An indentation bug in the mapping file of the S4-Connector has been fixed which triggered an error in cases where &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/dns/ignorelist was unset or empty (44711).
The group membership sync now correctly identifies ucs_module_others if defined in the mapping (47779).
Renaming a container (only difference in upper and lower case) has been fixed (47374).

When password change on next login had been activated for a user the S4-Connector removed shadowMax and krb5PasswordEnd and reset shadowLastChange to 0 when synchronizing changes back from Samba/AD to UDM/OpenLDAP. In an &ucsUAS; specific UMC module this caused a display issue, where the next required password change was shown as never (47508, 47595).
The S4-Connector no longer updates the obsolete attribute sambaPwdMustChange (45282).

The Connector now updates the AD attribute userPrincipalName if the UCS username is changed. This is enabled only for new installations. For old systems unset &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/mapping/sync/userPrincipalName and restart the AD-Connector to sync username to userPrincipalName on subsequent object modifications (48153).
univention-adsearch now accepts space separated attribute list as parameter (43189).
Non-printable attributes in univention-adsearch are printed base64 encoded (48082).
The special cn=Subschema object caused AD-Connector rejects (47396).
The synchronization of the attribute proxyAddress may fail if is empty (46751).
Fix AD to UCS password hash synchronization in cases where a custom Domain Admin account is configured for the AD connection (47069).
The error messages for the join into an Active Directory domain have been improved (42430).
Fix Kerberos authentication error during AD-Connector restart in AD/member mode in case of changed system time (48227).
The synchronization of password hashes from AD to UCS has been fixed on systems that have &ucsUCRV; connector/ldap/server set to a non-master server with read-only OpenLDAP (44024).
The package univention-ad-connector-exchange did reset specific &ucsUCRV; values to their default during the update. This has been adjusted to keep customer adjusted values untouched (47856).
The tool univention-adsearch now also uses the file containing the full certificate chain instead of only the exported AD certificate alone (47858).
Support SASL/GSSAPI in AD Connection setup scripts (to support integrity checking during binds) (47901).
A traceback during the add of users in AD with telephone attributes has been fixed (47209).
Adapt to changes in univention-directory-manager-modules (47861).

The machine account password is changed by default every 21 days. That check is by default performed nightly a 01:00 by a cron job. That point of time can now be configured through the new &ucsUCRV; server/password/cron (47781).
